headline: GTA Online
subtitle: TIME TRIALS WEEK (May 6-12): Double GTA$ & RP in Daily Freemode Time Trials and more
content:
This week, we've got a daily rotation of Freemode Time Trials all offering Double GTA$ and RP rewards to daring racers able to beat the par time to complete them. To make sure you're equipped for the challenge, Legendary Motorsport and Los Santos Customs are offering huge discounts on blazing fast vehicles and engine mods. All of this and more are live today through to next week Thursday May 12th.

Check out rockstargames.com/newswire for all the details.
